latex:
Arithmetic sequences $ (a_n)$ and $ (b_n)$ have integer terms with $ a_1 = b_1 = 1 < a_2 \le b_2$ and $ a_nb_n = 2010$ for some $ n$. What is the largest possible value of $ n$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 3 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 8 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 288 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 2009$
